Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.factory

Class WebDriverFactory

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.factory.WebDriverFactory
public class WebDriverFactory extends Object
Factory class for creating WebDriver instances based on registered driver providers.

This class manages WebDriver providers for different browser types and facilitates the creation of WebDriver instances with appropriate configurations.

By default, Chrome and Edge drivers are registered. Additional drivers can be registered dynamically using the registerDriver(String, DriverProvider) method.

  • Method Details

    • registerDriver

      public static <T extends DriverProvider<?>> void registerDriver(String type, T provider)
      Registers a new WebDriver provider for a specified browser type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type parameter extending DriverProvider.
      Parameters:
      type - The browser type (e.g., "CHROME", "EDGE").
      provider - The driver provider responsible for creating and managing the WebDriver instance.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If a driver for the specified type is already registered.

    • createDriver

      public static org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver createDriver(String type, WebDriverConfig config)
      Creates a WebDriver instance for the specified browser type, using the provided configuration.
      Parameters:
      type - The browser type (e.g., "CHROME", "EDGE").
      config - The WebDriver configuration, specifying options such as version and headless mode.
      Returns:
      A fully configured WebDriver instance.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If no driver is registered for the specified type.
      RuntimeException - If WebDriver creation fails due to an unexpected error.
